title: 21 Days of Gratitude by Louie Schwartzberg
description:
Mentors Channel and award winning cinematographer Louie Schwartzberg, offer you a whole new way to meditate.Embark on a never before traveled, journey into gratitude, through extraordinary audio and stunning video presentations. Listen to inspirational thoughts from our narrator and twenty one pre-eminent mentors, leading minds of industry, science, entertainment and spirituality. Keep your eyes open, as you enjoy dazzling images of nature that transport you to a magical place, or, with eyes closed, allow soothing melodies melodies take you to a quiet place within.

THIS ONE-OF-A KIND JOURNEY OFFERS:
* An unorthodox, reliable way for anyone to meditate
* 4 bonus videos and 21 audio meditations enhanced with extraordinary visuals 
* Golden nuggets from world renowned mentors

DURING THIS TRANSFORMATIONAL JOURNEY YOU MAY:
* Learn how to enhance every aspect of your life with gratitude 
* Heal and/or strengthen family bonds through gratitude 
* Discover your unique place in the universe
* Begin to appreciate nature in a whole new way
* Turn your dreams and desires into reality through the practice of gratitude


This is my first torrent. I don't have a very fast upload speed... it's worth the wait though!
